TopicTitle: Mission to outer solar system (RSS extended)

Articles.Content: I have designed  a challenge for those worthy of  such reward (The feeling of accomplishment) This challenge is...  be the first to land a base with three kerbals (kerbalism mod installed) onto the following bodies: Pluto, Charon, Makemake and finally sedna. Proof of completion will be requested so we can determine the winners( this must be a video to insure no cheating took place)  The kerbals must be alive and healthy (cannot be insane) and no kerbal is to die along the way. Good luck challengers!!!
